item.title: WordPress 6.9 “Gene”
item.description:
WordPress 6.9 is here!

A major upgrade for team collaboration and content creation.

  • Notes Feature: Introduces block-level commenting for streamlined reviewing and polishing content.
  • Command Palette: Faster navigation across the dashboard for power users.
  • Abilities API: Standardized way to enable AI-powered and automated workflows.
